Package com.example.blackbox.inventory

Class InventoryDB

java.lang.Object
com.example.blackbox.inventory.InventoryDB
public class InventoryDB extends Object
Handles interactions with the Firestore database for managing inventory items.

    • addImagesToDB

      public void addImagesToDB(ArrayList<android.net.Uri> imageList)
      Adds a new images to the 'images' collection in the Firestore database.
      Parameters:
      imageList - The Uri objects to be added to the database.

    • getImagesByItemId

      public void getImagesByItemId(String itemId, android.content.Context context, ArrayList<android.net.Uri> displayedUris, InventoryDB.OnGetImagesCallback callback)
      Retrieves images associated with a specific itemId from the Firestore 'images' collection and adds the URIs of newly created local files to the displayedUris ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID of the item for which images need to be retrieved.
      context - The Context of the application/activity.
      displayedUris - The ArrayList of URIs to which the URIs of new local files will be added.

    • updateItemInDB

      public void updateItemInDB(Item old_item, Item new_item)
      Updates an item in the Firestore database with new values
      Parameters:
      old_item - The item to be replaced.
      new_item - The item from which the new values should come.
